attributes.action: urge the Speaker of the House of Commons to resign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Martin's time as Speaker of The House of Commons is over, he has let down the people of this country and should go now before he does more damage.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
